summary:
Hi!

I'm Michiel Nijk. Since we're all busy, here's some info about me in bird's eye view:


Education

I was born in Amsterdam, but grew up in Heerhugowaard, a town near Alkmaar in Holland. I went to high school in Alkmaar, and subsequently to University in Amsterdam.

- Murmellius Gymnasium, gymnasium B, Alkmaar
- Propedeuse Biologie, Universiteit van Amsterdam


Novels

I didn't finish my molecular biology studies. When I was in my third year, my first science fiction novel was published. Iron must be cast when it's hot, so I stopped studying, and threw myself on writing.

- De Heersers van Kant, Luitingh Sijthoff, 1995
- Vrije Val, Luitingh Sijthoff, 1997


Programming

I've always programmed computers, although not always as prolifically as during the past decade. I'm self taught, which, in my view, has both an upside and a downside. The upside - every new task you can force a computer to perform is a magical accomplishment. The downside - self tuition is a lot more time consuming than being taught.

I've mastered the following languages:

- .Net (vb.net, c#,  Aspx)
- Java 
- JavaScript
- SQL (I don't consider this 'a language' but I've mastered it just the same)

I'm very experienced in the following programming fields:

- IP connection code
- Networking code in the broadest sense 
- Database code (Active Directory , Azure, OpenLDAP, Oracle, Microsoft SQL)
- Serialization code
- Code refactoring
- Unmanaged code

Some of the software applications I've developed:

- Logon Analyzer, http://www.LogonAnalyzer.com
- Aduc Admin +,  http://www.aducadmin.com
- Database Comparer,  http://www.databasecomparer.com


My motto

Object oriented programming is object oriented programming. What I don't yet master, I will in a month or so. I've never come across a problem I couldn't solve.

Greetings!
Michiel

profile_positions.description: I've developed all the products that Vision-it.org currently has on offer, such as Logon Analyzer (www.logonanalyzer.com), Aduc Admin + (www.aducadmin.com) and Database Comparer (www.databasecomparer.com).
profile_positions.title: software developer
